name: Obsidian Javelin
description: The Obsidian Javelin is a variant of the Obsidian Spear that can only be thrown. Deals fire damage on hit and has a 15% chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while also setting them ablaze. Excels when used against Fauna that have a weakness to fire.
